message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.CY, cs.LG

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques to detect racism in Dutch social media comments. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP and related topics. The paper also involves the creation and use of dictionaries, which falls under the sub-category cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The use of Support Vector Machines for classification falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning), and the use of word embeddings falls under cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). Finally, the paper deals with social issues such as racism, which could also fall under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
